description: System-generated unique identifier for this asset billing record or configuration.
Internal fleet identifier for the vehicle or equipment being billed.
Owning or responsible entity or department associated with the asset and recipient of charges.
Standard recurring charge applied to the asset, typically per month or billing period.
Narrative or parameters describing how the base charge is calculated, including inclusions, periods, or exceptions.
Human-readable description of the charge category or code used on the invoice.
Coverage limit amount tied to the assetâ€™s insurance for billing or cost allocation.
Rate used to calculate the insurance premium allocated to this asset.
Indicates inclusion of consumed parts in the charges.
Indicates whether a markup is applied to parts charges.
Indicates inclusion of labor charges.
Indicates inclusion of subcontracted or outside-service charges.
Indicates inclusion of miscellaneous fees or adjustments.
Indicates whether credit adjustments are applied on the statement.
Indicates inclusion of fuel costs.
Indicates whether a markup is applied to fuel charges.
Indicates the base charge is assessed monthly.
Indicates inclusion of insurance-related charges.
Indicates inclusion of distance-based charges (per mile or kilometer).
Indicates inclusion of internal department allocations or passthrough charges.
Indicates whether departmental allocations include an added markup; confirm with SME.
Indicates inclusion of capital recovery or asset replacement charges.
Amount assessed for capital recovery or replacement of the asset.
System code representing an additional recurring charge category applied to the asset.
Description of the additional recurring charge category corresponding to the code.
Rate or amount for the additional recurring charge type.
Indicates whether charges are applied in January.
Indicates whether charges are applied in February.
Indicates whether charges are applied in March.
Indicates whether charges are applied in April.
Indicates whether charges are applied in May.
Indicates whether charges are applied in June.
Indicates whether charges are applied in July.
Indicates whether charges are applied in August.
Indicates whether charges are applied in September.
Indicates whether charges are applied in October.
Indicates whether charges are applied in November.
Indicates whether charges are applied in December.
